Hello.

 

-KSP 1.4.1

-Making History

-New installation. No mods.

Hi astronauts,

I have the same problem! Does somebody knows why it could be?

Thanks!

PiKiNiK, I realised there was a version 1.4.2 (I am maintaining my non-steam license).

Try updating and see if it's still a problem. I think 1.4.2 might have fixed it for me, despite it not being mentioned in the changelog. I say might because I've only had the time to do one re-entry since I updated - Hardly a thorough test.

See how it works for you.
